buttons.option_select: Please select the type of list you wish to upload
buttons.uploaded_by_institution: Show only files of my Institution
buttons.delete_tooltip: Can only be deleted by members of the file's institution, if not yet downloaded

home.title: Home
home.text1:
Within the framework of the BMBF programme [UC²], we process available data and collect new or missing data utilizing long-term measurements, intensive measurement campaigns and physical modelling. To support the exchange of observation and model data between the project partners beyond the module boundaries, e.g. for the validation of the newly developed urban climate model PALM-4U or urban climatological and scientific studies, this data management system (DMS) was developed within the research programme.
 If you have an account, you can upload data that meets the requirements via the upload page. If not logged in, you can see and download data that is published under open licences. Please refer to the data standard and data policy, linked above, for more information.
home.text2: The use of a uniform data format, as well as binding conventions for the use of data and metadata, is an essential prerequisite for their effective and efficient administration in the DMS. Also, a uniform data standard enables the development and provision of innovative tools for the analysis and visualization of complex and very heterogeneous data. After completion of the programme, data published under open licences will remain publicly available.
home.caption: Data management system outline of the BMBF programme Urban climate under Change [UC²]. Data flow depends on the assigned data policy. Reprinted from Scherer et al., 2019

upload.info_text:
Below, you are able to upload one or more files to the [UC²] Data Management System.
On upload, a data conformity check will be run to verify files meet the requirements.
The results of the conformity check and the upload status will be displayed below.
upload.format_note:
Please note: At the moment, we do only accept netCDF files meeting the [UC²] %{link} requirements.
In future, we will support other data formats as well.
upload.title: Upload
upload.droparea: Drag one or more files here</br>or click to browse

login_info.text: You are not logged in. You are only shown data released under public licences. To see additional data, please log in. Don't have an account yet? Register.

search.info_text:
Type in your search keywords below. We support querying files for most of the meta data. Currently, we do not yet support queries for coordinates or time periods.
You can also filter by a specific institution, site or variable.
Use toggle options to include files marked as old (not the most recent version of the file) or invalid.
Colored results mark erroneous files or files that contain warnings.
If logged in, you can also filter for the files you uploaded using the respective toggle option.
search.title: Search
search.mark_invalid_warning: This operation is irreversible. It will not delete the file from the data base. You may, however, upload a more recent version afterwards.

register.title: Register
register.success_message: Registration form was sent. The application will be processed and you will receive Email on status change.

footer.system: Data Management System [UC²] - BMBF Programme Urban Climate Under Change

reset_password.title: Set new password
reset_password.reset_ok: Password changed. Please click ok and log in using the new password.
reset_password.requested: Request sent. You will receive E-Mail, containing a link to set a new password.

request_password.title: Forgot Password
request_password.info: Please fill in your account name or E-Mail to request a password change. In case, this information is not avvailable, please contact the support.
